item.title: How to change Java Version/JAVA_HOME for Ant?
item.description: I wrote this earlier on a Github gist, but putting it here for a consolidated reference. Want to change Java Version/JAVA_HOME for Ant builds? Open ~/.antrc file by running vim ~/.
